role_description: An Ansible role that installs hyperfine (the command-line benchmarking tool) on nearly any playform
role_description_full_overview: [hyperfine](https://github.com/sharkdp/hyperfine) is a cross-platform command-line benchmarking tool that can be used to determine the performance of shell commands.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs hyperfine (the command-line benchmarking tool) on nearly any playform.
